attributes.action: institute a policy favouring the housing, benefit and healthcare needs of natives of this country, the BRITISH Isles, over those of unskilled immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The native people of this country are suffering due to the ever increasing amount of 'non - skilled' immigrants entering and staying in the country. That native British taxpayers, be they Welsh, English, Northern Irish or Scottish, sustain immigrant communities through benefits and healthcare paid for by their taxes, is clearly an injustice and is wrong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
